title: How do I get out of a boot loop on a brand new out of the box pixel XL
content:
Been looking online for bootloop fixes and have come across nothing useful. 
Tonight I got my brand new pixel XL and was excited to use it. I proceeded to set it up but shortly after everything was finished it froze. I restarted it and after it booted up, it shut down again. 
From them till now it's been stuck in a bootloop.
Anybody know how I can fix this?
